OUR DIFFERENCE

  • Our differencE
  • What is a rug
  • Featured homes
  • History of rugs

WHAT SETS ARTISAN RUG GALLERY APART?

At Artisan Rug Gallery we strive to bring you the best experience possible. Purchasing a rug for your home should be a pleasant experience. Owner Jeff Deutsch and his knowledgeable, friendly staff respond to the unique challenges and aesthetic needs of each client, from those purchasing a single rug to experienced designers building large collections. We pride ourselves on our ability to obtain virtually any rug to satisfy any style. With a particular eye for detail and an intimate and complete knowledge of the inventory of the store, Jeff and his qualified staff can help you select a rug that adds warmth, depth, pattern and color to your home, one that will inherently speak of the history, culture and art of its origin.

LEARN MORE ABOUT US

Each handcrafted rug of the Artisan Rug Gallery is individually selected for its fine quality, uniqueness, and vastness of color, directly from the creators of the rugs themselves. They speak to the rich cultural mosaic of Turkey, Iran, Egypt, Pakistan, India, Afghanistan, and Eastern Europe. The phenomenal selection guarantees a rug for every taste. Sultanabad. Mahal. Gabbeh. Serapi. Kashkuli. Shekarlou. Kazak. Luri. Balouch. Contemporary and Traditional. Personal attention from the staff assures the well educated and perfect choice for you.

MORE ON RUG HISTORY

WHAT SETS US APART

In the modern rug market there are many types of hand-made rugs, all with varying quality. We at Artisan Rug Gtallery would like to offer you the education you need to understand and recognize a superior quality rug when you come across one. We will start by covering the basics of how an exquisite handmade rug is made and then move on to how you, the consumer, can discover the clues that indicate when a rug is really a work of art.
